Class Shop

java.lang.Object
application.Shop
public class Shop extends Object
Provides shop functionality for purchasing miner upgrades. Handles pickaxe and oxygen upgrades with predefined costs and benefits.

    • buyPickaxeUpgrade

      public static boolean buyPickaxeUpgrade(Miner miner, GameModel model)
      Purchases a pickaxe upgrade for the miner if affordable and not at max level.
      Parameters:
      miner - the miner to upgrade
      model - the game model for notifications
      Returns:
      true if upgrade was successful, false otherwise
